bib.title: Hybrid evolutionary algorithm applied to automated floor plan generation
bib.author: Nisztuk, Maciej and Myszkowski, Pawe{\l} B
bib.abstract: The article presents the application of Hybrid Evolutionary and Greedy-based algorithms to the problem of Automated Floor Plan Generation. The described optimization issue is part of a wider domain of Computer-Aided Architectural Design. The article covers the extensive
bib.publisher: SAGE Publications Sage UK: London, England
